thread.title: DirectView to Attend the 2015 International Association of Chiefs of Police Conference in Chicago October 25-27
thread.title_full: DirectView to Attend the 2015 International Association of Chiefs of Police Conference in Chicago October 25-27 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DirectView to Attend the 2015 International Association of Chiefs of Police Conference in Chicago October 25-27
text:
DirectView Holdings, Inc.
NEW YORK , October 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Company to discuss its products, smart body-warn cameras for security and law enforcement, with interested parties from among the more than 14,000 safety professionals expected to attend IACP 2015, the largest and most important law enforcement event of the year
DirectView Holdings, Inc. (OTC: DIRV) ("DirectView" or the "Company"), a company focused on ownership and management of leading video and security technology companies, today announced that it will be attending the 2015 IACP or International Association of Chiefs of Police Conference in Chicago, Illinois from October 25 th - 27 th .
During the conference, the Company will have the opportunity to discuss its line of body-worn-cameras and related solutions with interested parties from among the more than 14,000 Police Chiefs and safety professionals throughout the United States and from around the world who are expected to attend. IACP 2014 attracted more than 16,000 attendees from 84 different countries. The conference represents an excellent opportunity for DirectView to discuss and display its smart body camera systems with Police Chiefs and other industry leaders. The company has begun discussions with certain Police Chiefs about the potential deployment of DirectViews smart body worn camera systems and looks forward to personal meetings at the show.
Roger Ralston , CEO and Chairman of DirectView, stated, "We are very excited to participate in the IACP 2015 and look forward to having numerous productive discussions and meetings during the event. We feel we have the most advanced smart body worn camera system to be coming to market and have had excellent feedback thus far from our demonstrations. ICAP 2015 brings our exact target audience together and we intend to maximize our efforts at this event as we seek to roll out our body camera systems in into the law enforcement market."
About DirectView Holdings, Inc.
DirectView Holdings, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides video surveillance solutions and teleconferencing products and services to businesses and organizations. The company operates in two divisions, Security (Video Surveillance) and Video Conferencing. The Security division offers technologies in surveillance systems providing onsite and remote video and audio surveillance, digital video recording, and services. It also sells and installs surveillance systems; and sells maintenance agreements. The company sells its products and services in the United States and internationally through direct sales force, referrals, and its Websites. The Video Conferencing division offers teleconferencing products and services that enable clients to conduct remote meetings by linking participants in geographically dispersed locations. It is involved in the sale of conferencing services based upon usage, the sale and installation of video equipment, and the sale of maintenance agreements. This division primarily provides conferencing products and services to numerous organizations ranging from law firms, banks, high tech companies and government organizations. For more information visit our website at http://www.DirectView.com and connect with us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, and Google+.
